---
title: '如何创建一个swapfile'
date: 2023-11-07 10:17:38
tags: [Linux]
published: true
hideInList: false
feature: 
isTop: false
---

** btrfs系统不支持swapfile!!!不支持swapfile!!!不支持swapfile!!!**
![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

<!-- more -->

```bash
sudo dd if=/dev/zero of=/swapfile bs=1M count=<your like size such as 1024>
sudo mkswap /swapfile
sudo swapon /swapfile
free -m
```
